alert.note: Alert for Eddy; Lea (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 02 at 7:12PM MDT until October 02 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Eddy County in southeastern New Mexico... Southwestern Lea County in southeastern New Mexico... * Until 815 PM MDT. * At 712 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles east of Loving, or 22 miles east of Carlsbad, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Eddy and southwestern Lea Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
